steps.name: Creating Inwarranty Job with Create Job API
Setting up the BaseURI , Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching sensitive data filter for a role attaching payload
Getting the Property Value from the config file
Getting the Auth Token for the role

parameters.name: payload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Srinvas, last_name=K, mobile_number=9811122334, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=test@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=010, apartment_name=Apt111, street_name=Homadevanahalli, landmark=Near Podar, area=Bangalore, pincode=560083, country=Karnataka, state=India], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-01-03T01:22:13.851679081Z, serial_number=13235812527895, imei1=13235812527895, imei2=13235812527895, popurl=2026-01-03T01:22:13.851818332Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=Battery Issue]]]

parameters.name: createJobPayload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Srinvas, last_name=K, mobile_number=9811122334, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=test@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=010, apartment_name=Apt111, street_name=Homadevanahalli, landmark=Near Podar, area=Bangalore, pincode=560083, country=Karnataka, state=India], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-01-03T01:22:13.851679081Z, serial_number=13235812527895, imei1=13235812527895, imei2=13235812527895, popurl=2026-01-03T01:22:13.851818332Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=Battery Issue]]]

steps.name: Expecting the response to have Content Type as Application/JSON, status 200 and Response time less than 1000ms

labels.name: story
labels.value: FD should be able to create job
